bioconda.name: bioconductor-dnashaper
bioconda.summary: High-throughput prediction of DNA shape features

biotools.summary: R/BioConductor package for ultra-fast, high-throughput predictions of DNA shape features. The package allows to predict, visualize and encode DNA shape features for statistical learning.

bioschemas.name: DNAshapeR
bioschemas.summary: R/BioConductor package for ultra-fast, high-throughput predictions of DNA shape features. The package allows to predict, visualize and encode DNA shape features for statistical learning.
